# GitHub Copilot Instructions - Africa Railways Website

## Project Overview

This repository contains the Africa Railways Website project. The project aims to provide information and services related to railway transportation across Africa.

## Coding Guidelines

### General Principles
- Write clean, readable, and maintainable code
- Follow the existing code style and patterns in the repository
- Use meaningful variable and function names
- Keep functions focused and single-purpose
- Add comments only when necessary to explain complex logic

### Best Practices
- Prefer simple, straightforward solutions over complex ones
- Handle errors gracefully and provide informative error messages
- Validate all user input
- Never commit secrets, API keys, or sensitive data to the repository

## Testing

- Write tests for new functionality when test infrastructure exists
- Ensure tests are deterministic and reliable
- Test edge cases and error conditions

## Documentation

- Update README and documentation when making significant changes
- Document public APIs and interfaces
- Use clear and concise language

## Security

- Follow security best practices
- Sanitize user input to prevent injection attacks
- Use secure connections (HTTPS) for external APIs
- Keep dependencies up to date to avoid known vulnerabilities

## Contributing

- Create focused, single-purpose commits
- Write clear commit messages
- Keep pull requests small and reviewable
- Address review feedback promptly
